title: Hello World: My First Blog Post
excerpt: Welcome to my new blog built with Next.js and Contentlayer. This is my first post exploring the world of modern web development.

body.raw:
# Hello World: My First Blog Post Welcome to my new blog! I'm excited to share my journey in web development and technology. ## What I'll be writing about In this blog, I'll be covering: - **Web Development**: Next.js, React, and modern JavaScript - **Content Management**: Using Contentlayer for structured content - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS and modern design practices - **Performance**: Optimization techniques and best practices ## Getting Started This blog is built with: - **Next.js 14** with App Router - **Contentlayer 2** for content management - **MDX** for enhanced markdown - **Tailwind CSS** for styling - **TypeScript** for type safety ## Code Example Here's a simple React component: ```jsx function Greeting({ name }) { return

Hello, {name}!

; } ``` Stay tuned for more posts about web development, coding tips, and technology insights!
